meanings.definition: Suitable for or inclined to socializing in clubs.
meanings.sent1: She is a clubbable person who enjoys spending time with friends at the local club.
meanings.sent2: The clubbable atmosphere at the gathering made everyone feel welcome and included.
meanings.sent3: His clubbable nature shone through as he effortlessly mingled with the other members.
meanings.sent4: The team's chemistry on the field was so clubbable, they worked together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The cozy, clubbable vibe of the pub drew in regulars and newcomers alike.

meanings.definition: Sociable or friendly, especially in a club setting.
meanings.sent1: The clubbable group of friends always had a great time together at their weekly meetings.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her clubbable personality, making everyone feel at ease in her presence.
meanings.sent3: The cat's clubbable behavior at the pet club meeting amused everyone in attendance.
meanings.sent4: The clubbable atmosphere at the party was infectious, spreading joy to all the guests.
meanings.sent5: His clubbable demeanor made him the life of the party wherever he went.
